original_text: The leader of the soldiers said to his men, ‘Take this man into our building. Then hit him with whips. We must find out what he has done. He must tell us why the Jews are shouting so loudly against him.’
korean_text: 천부장이 바울을 영내로 데려가라 명하고 그들이 무슨 일로 그에 대하여 떠드는지 알고자 하여 채찍질하며 심문하라 한대

sentences.original_text: The leader of the soldiers said to his men
We must find out what he has done
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그가 무엇을 했는지 알아내야 한다

sentences.original_text: He must tell us why the Jews are shouting so loudly against him'
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유대인들이 왜 그에게 그렇게 큰 소리로 소리치고 있는지 우리에게 말해야 한다'
